017package org.apache.juneau.bean;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.ThrowableUtils.*;
021
022import java.text.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.html.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.html.annotation.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.oapi.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.objecttools.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
032
033/**
034 * Simple bean that implements a hyperlink for the HTML serializer.
035 *
036 * <p>
037 * The name and url properties correspond to the following parts of a hyperlink in an HTML document...
038 * <p class='bxml'>
039 *    <xt>&lt;a</xt> <xa>href</xa>=<xs>'href'</xs><xt>&gt;</xt>name<xt>&lt;/a&gt;</xt>
040 * </p>
041 *
042 * <p>
043 * When encountered by the {@link HtmlSerializer} class, this object gets converted to a hyperlink.
044 * All other serializers simply convert it to a simple bean.
045 *
046 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
047
048 * </ul>
049 */
050@HtmlLink
051@Bean(findFluentSetters=true)
052public class LinkString implements Comparable<LinkString> {
053   private String name;
054   private java.net.URI uri;
055
056   /** No-arg constructor. */
057   public LinkString() {}
058
059   /**
060    * Constructor.
061    *
062    * @param name Corresponds to the text inside of the <xt>&lt;A&gt;</xt> element.
063    * @param uri Corresponds to the value of the <xa>href</xa> attribute of the <xt>&lt;A&gt;</xt> element.
064    * @param uriArgs Optional arguments for {@link MessageFormat} style arguments in the href.
065    */
066   public LinkString(String name, String uri, Object...uriArgs) {
067      setName(name);
068      setUri(uri, uriArgs);
069   }
070
071   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
072   // Bean properties
073   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
074
075   /**
076    * Bean property getter:  <property>name</property>.
077    *
078    * <p>
079    * Corresponds to the text inside of the <xt>&lt;A&gt;</xt> element.
080    *
081    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
082    */
083   public String getName() {
084      return name;
085   }
086
087   /**
088    * Bean property setter:  <property>name</property>.
089    *
090    * <p>
091    * Corresponds to the text inside of the <xt>&lt;A&gt;</xt> element.
092    *
093    * @param value
094    *    The new value for this property.
095    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
096    * @return This object
097    */
098   public LinkString setName(String value) {
099      this.name = value;
100      return this;
101   }
102
103   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
104   // uri
105   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
106
107   /**
108    * Bean property getter:  <property>uri</property>.
109    *
110    * <p>
111    * Corresponds to the value of the <xa>href</xa> attribute of the <xt>&lt;A&gt;</xt> element.
112    *
113    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
114    */
115   public java.net.URI getUri() {
116      return uri;
117   }
118
119   /**
120    * Bean property setter:  <property>uri</property>.
121    *
122    * <p>
123    * Corresponds to the value of the <xa>href</xa> attribute of the <xt>&lt;A&gt;</xt> element.
124    *
125    * @param value
126    *    The new value for this property.
127    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
128    * @return This object
129    */
130   public LinkString setUri(java.net.URI value) {
131      this.uri = value;
132      return this;
133   }
134   /**
135    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>uri</property>.
136    *
137    * <p>
138    * Corresponds to the value of the <xa>href</xa> attribute of the <xt>&lt;A&gt;</xt> element.
139    *
140    * @param value
141    *    The new value for this property.
142    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
143    * @return This object.
144    */
145   public LinkString setUri(String value) {
146      setUri(value, new Object[0]);  // NOSONAR - Not fixable.
147      return this;
148   }
149
150   /**
151    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>uri</property>.
152    *
153    * <p>
154    * Corresponds to the value of the <xa>href</xa> attribute of the <xt>&lt;A&gt;</xt> element.
155    *
156    * @param value
157    *    The new value for this property.
158    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
159    * @param args {@link MessageFormat}-style arguments in the URL.
160    * @return This object.
161    */
162   public LinkString setUri(String value, Object...args) {
163      for (var i = 0; i < args.length; i++)
164         try {
165            args[i] = OpenApiSerializer.DEFAULT.getSession().serialize(HttpPartType.PATH, null, args[i]);
166         } catch (SchemaValidationException | SerializeException e) {
167            throw asRuntimeException(e);
168         }
169      this.uri = java.net.URI.create(format(value, args));
170      return this;
171   }
172
173   /**
174    * Returns the name so that the {@link ObjectSearcher} class can search against it.
175    */
176   @Override /* Object */
177   public String toString() {
178      return name;
179   }
180
181   @Override /* Comparable */
182   public int compareTo(LinkString o) {
183      return name.compareTo(o.name);
184   }
185
186   @Override /* Object */
187   public boolean equals(Object o) {
188      return (o instanceof LinkString o2) && Utils.eq(this, o2, (x,y)->x.name.equals(y.name));
189   }
190
191   @Override /* Object */
192   public int hashCode() {
193      return super.hashCode();
194   }
195}
